review_text:
I could not recommend this home more highly!! A+++
This is our second stay and I‚Äôm positive we will be back again in the future. Patricia‚Äôs home is always clean and inviting. The beds are really comfortable, the AC IS GREAT, and the location is perfectly situated within 3 blocks in all directions to our family members.
Thank you again Patricia!

I love Patricia‚Äôs place, a real home away from home. I‚Äôve stayed here a few times and it never disappoints. Comfortable, everything you need and in a safe and convenient neighbourhood for all things Borger has to offer
I love Patrica‚Äôs place. Very homely and always a comfortable stay. I‚Äôve stayed here several times as work has bought me into the area, and I wouldn‚Äôt stay anywhere else!

Patricia was just an amazing no host. A few of the FPC students got this house to get ready and relax in between exams, practice, ceremonies, and graduation. She was soo nice, even offered her back porch in case some of us wanted to go after and celebrate. üéâ The house was about 5 minutes from the college which made it ten times even better for us! Definitely recommend, very clean, so comfortable and very will located.

I loved Patrica‚Äôs lovely home. It was super clean and has a very well appointed kitchen with everything you needed.
The neighbourhood was lovely and quiet and felt very safe (I went running a few times on my own and felt very safe)
Very easy to get to all the key bits of Borger, whether you are here for work or fun.
I will definitely use Patricia‚Äôs place again
very nice peaceful and quiet

Tish was a PERFECT hostess! I highly recommend this property. Fantastic parking, beautiful cottage inside and out! The beds are super comfortable! Her cottage made us feel very ‚Äúat home‚Äù, I really didn‚Äôt want to leave!
Will always try to book this place on any future visits to Borger.
My wife and Iove this place, definitely will come back soon!
Great stay, very friendly hosts. We‚Äôll stay here again.

Look no further! Exceptionally clean, cozy and very well appointed home! To top it off owner Patricia is extremely caring and welcoming. Did I mentioned how clean the place is!? Definitely staying here next time we are in town.

My 3rd time staying at this sweet cottage, will continue to stay here when I come to Texas from Louisiana, it‚Äôs a great location to my grandkids and Walmart, Trish is a great host and a beautiful person ..
will definitely rent this place again.
Great place, great stay!
Great place! Definitely will come back.

Fantastic host and home! Gerald was extremely accommodating and was very quick to respond to any questions we had. We would highly recommend Gerald and this home to anyone looking for a place to stay in Borger!

Gerald was an extremely accomodating and kind host. His place was immaculate and very well stocked and set up for a comfortable, easy stay. The cottage is beautifully decorated and the king bed was incredibly comfortable. From my first message about our stay to our departure, our stay was peaceful and relaxing stay. All the little extras and thoughtful touches made the stay wonderful. Gerald went above and beyond as a great host. We will definitely look forward to staying here again next time we will be in the area.

This home is minutes from shopping and right off the main highway but you wouldn‚Äôt know it - the neighborhood is quiet and safe. The home is cozy and the details in the home are just beautiful. The back patio is such a great space I really wish I was able to utilize it more but I plan to return! The owners are close and EXTREMELY KIND! They even left laundry soap- it was a perfect stay! Thank you so much for your great home and amazing hospitality.

This house is very clean and cozy. The owners really take pride of the inside as well as the outside. The washer and dryer works well. The house is located fairly close to good restaurants. The neighborhood is quiet. We had no issues with the Wi-Fi. We will definitely be staying here in the future, if it is available.

The Airbnb home is amazingly beautiful, clean and a get place to stay. The back yard area is decorated beautifully as well. Gerald is communicative always. We always try to book this place when we visit that area. Highly recommend.
Absolutely perfect!!
Gerald and his wife are great hosts - if you need to be in Borger, this is the place to stay!
Great hosts and comfortable cottage - it feels very cozy! We highly recommend them for a stay in Borger.
Mr. Gerald and his place were great! Both him and his wife were very kind and easy to talk to. The property is very well maintained and in a quiet neighborhood. We wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay again.
We really enjoyed our stay - They are excellent hosts and they create a cozy, comforting environment for they guests. We highly recommend it!
Great cottage , lovingly decorated with excellent hosts. We highly recommend this cottage for your stay in Borger !

Great location! Perfect for my wife, me, and our two small kids. It's super clean and well located. It's an easy drive to Lake Meredith, and Walmart is right up the street. The backyard is super nice too!
We had an amazing stay in Borger because of this perfect lil cottage. It was the perfect size for our family!

We enjoyed our stay while staying here. We came in town to visit family for the weekend. We will definitely be staying here again! Gerald‚Äôs place was extremely clean and comfortable. They are thoughtful with everything and provided a lot of amenities incase you forget something. We will be recommending this place to our family for future trips!

Wonderful people! My husband was here working and they couldn'thave been more helpful to us, very quick to respond to messages, very kind, the place was great it was very clean and according to my husband the beds were amazingly comfortable he really enjoyed being here! I would highlyrecommend this place if you are looking for a great place to stay when you are in this area.
This Cottage is amazing. Quaint and cozy. Just what we needed for our mini weekend getaway while in town for a wedding.
Very comfortable and peaceful accomodations. Close to restaurants, shopping and a beautiful lake with great fishing.
Great host and lovely little house an hour outside of Amarillo. thanks Gerald!

You can expect friendly faces to greet you, a cozy place you can call your home away from home, it is a smaller place but no worries. I am a large male and the place was perfect, comfortable beds, you have a nice accommodating back yard with a natural gas grill, and plenty of seating. it's away from the hustle and bustle but close enough that is you need to go to the store it is 5 minutes away.
Gerald's place is always sparkling clean and on point! It is our favorite place to stay when we come to TX. We will continue to use this airbnb and would recommend it to everyone!
Nice little place. Stayed for a weekend and it worked out perfectly
Great host and great little cottage. It is very clean and cozy. And close to town.
Very nice cottage, wonderful super host, made my stay in Borger a little easier.
Second stay!! Even better than the first. I can‚Äôt recommend it enough

House was clean and very nice. I got to talk with Gerald before heading back to work and hes really nice. I left some jeans after checkout and was able to get them no problem due to Geralds quick responses. Thank you and i plan on staying everytime in on town. As a matter a fact my colleagues are trying to book you for Monday
The most wonderful place to stay in Borger!

SOOOO amazing. I LOVED everything from the beautiful decor, to the extras like cooking spices, oil, plastic bags etc. The sweet babies Roxy & Max made being away from home better. The house is gorgeous but the backyard oasis was the BEST!!! If you get the chance to stay, DO IT!!!
The home was beautiful, clean, and had many amenities. The yard was absolutely amazing!

Gerald's Airbnb is one of the most beautiful Airbnbs I have stayed at. The home is quaint, clean and beautiful. The garden area is amazing with several areas for entertainment and relaxation. This Airbnb is one of my favorite places to date. Gerald was available at all times if there were any questions that needed answered. Gerald was amazing and very approachable. I would definitely recommend a stay here!

Older home, but it is kept in top condition. Feels like home! Landscaping is beautiful, backyard entertainment is spot on. Quiet neighborhood far away from the noise but only 5 to 7 minutes from stores and restaurants. Super friendly owners.
Great place too I highly recommend

I‚Äôve been visiting my grandkids that live in this area for 5 years now and have always stayed in a hotel or with them but after staying in this sweet cozy cottage last week for 4 nights I can‚Äôt see myself staying anywhere but Gerald and Tish‚Äôs place again, they are wonderful host and Good people, my husband and I highly recommend it, you will love it.
Great people and a great house! Would recommend the the cozy cottage to any person looking to stay in Borger or the surrounding area.
The cozy cottage was awesome! Will definitely book it againüòä
Cozy is the perfect word for this cottage! I could stay forever!
Like a second home to me... clean, comfortable, and classy!

I am in the area often and always try to stay here. Tish & Gerald are welcoming and their Cozy Cottage is like home away from home, only better! Everything you could possibly need is provided, including a fully appointed kitchen, a full-sized coffee maker with coffee, water bottles in the ‚Äòfrig, full sized toiletries, and the cutest little house with lovely accessories - nothing is done half way! The beds are large & comfortable - everything you need to truly feel cozy and cared for!
Extremely nice home. Excellent beds. Absolutely perfect place to stay!!!
Yes, I was back again...this place is awesome!!!
Yes, I stayed here again, and will continue to stay at this lovely cottage. It is so comfortable and friendly - a real home-away-from-home!

The Best Airbnb Ever! I travel quite a bit and have stayed in lovely hotels and Airbnb‚Äôs in the US and elsewhere. This Cozy Cottage is perfect. Although a smaller home, both bedrooms have large comfortable beds and plenty of sitting room, as well as an enormous garden area in the backyard that is pleasant, especially for coffee (supplied!) in the morning or wine as you enjoy the sunset.Gerald was immedia

Gerald and Tish are such wonderful hosts. The house is so very clean, with everything you need. The beds are really comfortable and the linens and towels are very nice. Having a washer and dryer to use makes our trip much easier as well! We have stayed with them several times now, and it is always perfect.
Absolutely loved it! Amazing, Gerald is the nicest
Our stay was awesome!
Gerald‚Äôs place is amazing lake Meredith was a hopping fishing spot. This place is the perfect little getaway.
Great communication and attention to every detail.
This is a very beautiful house with an amazing backyard! Hosts are quick to respond. Would definitely stay here again.
The Cozy Cottage was all that we could expect and more. Gerald and his wife were more than welcoming. We had a wonderful stay. We couldn‚Äôt have asked for it to be any better.

This is the second time we have stayed at Gerald‚Äôs place. The house is so clean, with really comfortable beds and so many nice touches. The outside patio is really great, we enjoyed evenings and mornings out there. The house is stocked with everything you could need, we were so comfortable there. And Gerald is an amazing host, super responsive if you have any questions.

Gerald and Tish, Thank you so much for my amazing stay at the Cozy Cottage"!! You have spoiled me and will never stay at a hotel in Borger again. You were both so hospitable and accommodating. The cottage was spotless and beautifully decorated and the yard, an unexpected oasis. I would not hesitate to recommend you to anyone. Thank and blessings, to my wonderful hosts. Patty
Loved the cottage and patio. The perfect getaway!

The house is beautifully decorated and had everything we needed. The beds were very comfortable and the kitchen and bathroom were fully stocked with very nice dishes and linens. The full size washer and dryer were great to have. Gerald thought of everything and was so accommodating. The backyard patio area is amazing. It was a real treat to have such a nice place to stay in this area. The house is central to several small towns in the area and only 45 minutes from Amarillo.

Gerald and Tish's cozy cottage is set in a tranquil residential area. The cottage has all the amenities that one could wish for. Beautifully decorated with a delightful backyard. Awesome king bed! Communication was a breeze. Don't miss out on this gem when searching for accommodation in the area!

This is a very beautiful, comfortable cottage. We are a family of four (2 adults and two teens) , and the cottage was just the right size for us. We came to the area to visit our daughter and grandchildren. The cottage would make a great home base for site seeing or a nice place to relax. Gerald, the host, responded quickly to any questions or needs we had. The decorations are beautiful and the beds are very comfortable. We highly recommend Gerald's cottage.
Very good stay, very pleasant house and well equipped. Gerald, very friendly and helpful.

It was truly a blessing to have stayed in this beautiful cottage! It is very comfortable and beautifully decorated. The landscaping and patio area was very tranquil and peaceful. Gerald and Tish were such a blessing to us. We highly recommend staying here!
We had a wonderful time staying at this property. The outdoor space was wonderful. It was even better than the pictures suggested. We enjoyed the indoor space and would highly recommend the space.
Definitely five stars for Mrs. Peggy and five more for the accommodation! Quiet and very comfortable place! Mrs. Peggy‚Äôs attention is exceptional.
This is my second time staying here with my pups. The house is always very clean & I love that the yard is completely fences so my dogs can roam a bit.
Peggy‚Äôs place accommodated perfectly. Was a nice peaceful stay, very quiet block. Would definitely book again the next time I am back in Borger.
Had a great stay! House was really clean ! Definitely recommend this house to anyone staying in Borger
I absolutely loved our stay felt right at home.
Great stay wish we could‚Äôve stayed longer.
Exactly what we were looking for. Nice house in a nice area. Would recommend.
Therlow was an amazing host. Highly recommend.
Perfect! Everything was as described!
Thanks for the hospitality! Great place to stay, only 3 min from my jobsite!
Nice clean place! Perfect for what we needed!
Cute little house in a quit neighborhood.

Angie‚Äôs place was great.
The house had everything you needed, including all the essential kitchen stuff if you are staying for a while and don‚Äôt want to eat out all the time.
The neighborhood was safe, I had some lovely chats with the neighbours and felt very comfortable out running on my own.
Definitely recommend this spot if you are in town and need somewhere to stay
Great little house.
It was just as described we didn‚Äôt have any issues
Great cozy place!
Very hospitable.
Great place to stay‚ù£Ô∏è
The place was perfect and close to where I was working. Had all the amenities I needed to accommodate me.
Cute house, very quiet neighborhood and close to job site!!!
The house has been nicely updated. The beds were comfortable, and everything I needed was available. Thank you!
Fantastic place! Clean and Comfortable!
Cute home with comfortable beds, pet friendly and excellent AC for trip thru Texas good proximity to shopping and Lake Meredith for fishing
Perfect stay !

The house was just as described and had everything we needed for a visit with my daughter who attends Frank Phillips College. The beds were comfortable and the neighborhood was quiet. The house is a cute cottage and very affordable. It was so nice to have a whole house to spend time with family for an Easter weekend visit!
Clean and easy to get into
Awesome and easy to work with
Great location. Perfect again for our family. Will stay here again for sure!
Private, very clean, comfortable, and worth the price: all descriptions of this cute little house. Very easy check in and close to town and the local eateries. A+ all the way!!!
Great location. Perfect for our family. Convenient location. I will stay here again! Thank you!!
Great stay! Very friendly and worked with us dispute unforeseen circumstances! A great cozy place for any and all weary travelers! Check this out if you are ever in the area!
Great place to stay
Cute and cozy and very welcoming
Great place for work trip! Thanks again Michelle for the hospitality.
Michelle‚Äôs place was a perfect for our family. The house was clean and well kept. We really enjoyed our stay.
We were here for grandson‚Äôs graduation. Very comfortable, everything was just as described on the site. Very responsive host. Would definitely stay here again.
I enjoyed my stay at Big Davis, the only issue I had, the internet would constantly drop out.
nice place !!! Recommend

My family of 5 stayed a night in route from CO to TX. We have stayed at many Airbnbs and have hosted many years as well. We loved the decor and vibe of this house. The neighbors where quiet and the place felt really safe. My 10 year old son told me it was his favorite place and asked if we would please stay there again. It was a perfect fit for our family. I would highly recommend. The soaking tub was my favorite. Will will definitely be back!
Great home and host!
very homey, very clean, we enjoyed our stay. would definitely come back.
it was a great stay but not having a microwave in the house was a huge negative
We needed a place for one night when traveling through the area. This was a clean and quiet place to stay. Michelle did a great job in communicating.
Very nice house, very homey and comfortable with lots of space. Thank you very much!

Michelle‚Äôs place is a true gem. We happen to be driving through the area and needed a decent place to lay our heads, we received so much more than that. I wish we were staying in the area longer, simply so we could have stayed a while longer. Michelle‚Äôs place so comfortable and homey. You can tell they‚Äôve put a lot of love into this sweet property. Someday, I hope to stay again.

We had a great stay. I needed a place to ‚Äúcall home‚Äù for a few days to host my grandchildren. There was plenty of room to spread out and enjoy each other. There were games there which the kids and I enjoyed playing. Everything was clean and fresh and very well decorated with a blend of decor that had a warm cozy homelike vibe. We loved our stay at Big Davis.

This place worked out perfect. I wanted remote and secluded and this was perfect. Everything was comfortable and easy to figure out, especially if you've stayed at an RV before. Not much to do in town, but a beautiful area and close to the lake.
Great host, will stay again for sure!!

Safe and secluded place that was great for our dogs‚Ä¶plenty of room to play. Brant and Stephanie were very nice and met us upon arrival. We ended up an hour early, but they graciously let us check in early. I had to text Brant and he got back to me when minutes with the answer. Camper was really nice and clean. A/C is great‚Ä¶which was nice after a day on Lake Meredith, which is like two minutes away. Electric for charging boat was a plus. Fishing was phenomenal at Lake Meredith too! We will definitely be back next year!!
The place was exactly as described, worked perfectly for our weekend getaway. Brant was extremely responsive, we would definitely stay again.

Brant was a great host! He took great care of us while we were there. The accommodations were great and so was the location. We stayed several weeks and we would not hesitate to stay next time we are out there! As long as he has an opening, we WILL stay with him next time we are out here for work!
Very close to the lake! We had a great time. The recent fires and burn ban did have a few things in the area shut down but we still had a great time. thanks!
great host and very responsive....worked with us week to week. nice gentleman and nice quiet neighborhood

The lofts are so cool. This was plenty of space for our group of 4, and enjoyed sitting on the patio watching the stars at night. Had supplies for cooking, and conditioner in the shower. We would stay again!

Thank you for the great place to stay. My elderly parents and I loved the location and privacy. Linens were clean. Instructions were clear. Host was polite and accommodating. We did not use the upstairs loft beds, but I did climb up to take a look. If you have a family and don't mind climbing a ladder, this would be great. We came for graduation at SFISD. Perfect for what we needed and close to our family.
I love the simplicity of the cabin. Everything was very clean. A nice place to get away if you want peace and quiet.
Nice place to stay, would recommend it to family/friends
The place was clean and looked just like the photos. they are pretty small and I would recommend bringing a camp table to use outside.

Jerod‚Äôs little cabin was just what we needed for our weekend. Luckily I was with my two teenage boys, so they had no problem climbing up to the lofts! The whole place is clean and newly remodeled; ever felt fresh and new. Kitchen and bathroom had what we needed and beds were comfy with cool, smooth linens. The cabin is right off the highway (20 paces!), but traffic wasn‚Äôt too bad and only occasionally did we hear a loud vehicle drive by. Front porch was nice to sit on in the sunshine, but the view is an empty field - I though we‚Äôd be closer to the lake. My bad for not studying the map better. Overall we were comfy and enjoyed our stay! Lake Meredith is beautiful - a hidden gem!!
We stayed for 3 nights while fishing at Lake Meredith. Perfect location for us. Place was very clean, and had plenty of parking for our boat. We will be back for sure!

Definitely worth the stay. Felt right at home. This was my first time doing the airBnb and I would highly recommend it. It was a pleasure to stay here, Jerod and Corina are excellent host. Definitely will be returning, and I love that they offer extended stays.
Gr
Loved the place and Jerod was fantastic.
Would definitely stay again! Friendly and helpful host
Cabin 54 accommodations were perfect.
great place to stay

Cool little place. As tiny as it looked from the outside, it was more spacious than we expected. Perfect for my work associate and I. Beds were comfy. Location was remote which I prefer quite a bit. We saw a few great sunsets during our stay. I would recommend this place to any and all.

Stayed in cabin 54. It is comfortable and fit all three of us well. I recommend it if you‚Äôre in town.
Just wish the fish were biting at the marina rn.

Cabin was spotless and bright. Heater kept us plenty warm. They definitely didn‚Äôt cheap out on the beds, super comfortable firm memory foam. They had snacks in the fridge for our arrival.
The parking was a little muddy, not an issue, just something to keep in mind if it‚Äôs raining. They had a mop and broom next to the fridge to help keep things clean though. Hot water didn‚Äôt last too long, but held just long enough for 3 guys to shower back to back.
Close to Fritch and Borger, also a 5-10 minute drive to the boat ramps. Definitely a worthy place to get out of the cold and rain after being out on the water all day.
It was perfect for us. Warm and cozy. Quiet and peaceful. Jerod was great
Jared was an awesome host! His place was very welcoming and immaculate. Make sure to read his directions on the Air B&B site. iPhone maps may lead you astray.
The cabin was beautiful and very nice and peaceful.
Would definitely stay again! Great price, very clean!
Wonderful place to stay. Host is very accommodating.
We would definitely stay here again! The cabin and location was perfect and had plenty of space for boat parking! The cabin was clean and nice! The hosts responded very quickly and were very helpful!
Convenient, clean, well located place that is fairly priced and quiet.
We enjoyed our stay. Overall, it was awesome. Dog friendly place to stay.
A great stay! & well prepared. Very understanding host
Great place, and location. Responds tentatively. Cabin was perfect for our little weekend get away! Simple, nice and cozy.
Very creative with his home decor. Very peaceful and quiet. Jerod very kind person and responds quickly.
Very nice cabin! Had a pleasant time. Clean and very cute. Would definitely come back!
Clean airbnb, plenty of towels to shower.
New, clean cabin near lake.
Beautiful sparkling clean apartment. Comfortable. Good AC. Host gracious and responsive.
Just a great place
Great location, really comfortable bed, and the a/c works great! Will definitely be back again.

I was fortunate to stay here for the 4th of July weekend with a three other friends of mine. We found finding the home very easy and Jerod had great recommendations for the local area. He was very quick to respond to any questions we had and super friendly. The home itself is wonderful. If you have a small group, this is easily the place to be. You could definitely do a larger group as well. The place was spotless and the AC cranked for those hot Texas summers. We found the furnishings comfortable and it was a great spot for us to relax and unwind at the end of the day. We interacted with both groups of neighbors while there and had a fantastic time. If you want to visit Amarillo, hike in Palo Duro, or enjoy a lake day; this is the place to be. Get out of the city and check this home out, you won't regret it. The only question you'll be asking after your stay is how much would it cost to build this place yourself.

Jerod was very quick in replying to me. His cabin was very clean, very nice, and looked just like the pictures. He provided towels, shampoo & conditioner, a bbq pit & chairs, etc. Highly recommend this cabin!

The Hedgecoke house was perfect for our long weekend. The house is easy to locate and check in was very easy. We appreciated the walk in shower and back bedroom that gave added privacy. The house had everything we would need to feel right at home. The hosts kept in contact to be sure we had everything we needed.

This home is one of the hidden gems of Borger! This home was one of the nicest places I've ever stayed in while traveling to Borger. Bob is such a great communicator and very helpful. Will book this home again in the future.
Was an amazing place great host love the renovated kitchen not far from everything at all
Nice home
Sam was very responsive. We cooked a lot of great meals in the well stocked kitchen. Looking forward to staying again when work brings us back to town!
Sam's listing was great! Everyone felt right at home. It's so clean, cozy, spacious, and had everything we needed. Sam and his wife were so friendly. Definitely recommend
Very clean and comfortable. Plenty of space. Host left snacks. Had everything we needed and more. Very convenient location. Very good restaurants and coffee shop nearby. We enjoyed our stay!

We were in town to work at the nitrogen plant down the road. The neighborhood was quiet even during the day for night shift workers. Job was cut short by one day and we were refunded half of the daily stay rate which is a great benefit when you do turnaround work.
Thanks again!!

Great place to stay if you‚Äôre going to be working at Phillips 66. Less than 10 minutes away from the job! Clean home, very spacious, had everything you needed to cook with. Also had cleaning supplies. Gym, job, restaurants, and grocery stores are all within 5-10 minutes.
Thank you, Sam!
Nice stay.
This place is great we stay there for a few nights. It's really cozy everything's around all the stores everything you need. You can just take off walking to get to any store Very convenient
Second time stayed and was as great as the first. Great stay overall.
Neat little house in Borger. Clean and quiet with no outside distractions.

Very clean, the place was better than what you see in the photos
Very nice, very quiet.
Great place to stay
Easy location to get to. Roomy. Communication was good. Plenty of room. No outside furniture if you want to sit outside. Clean home.
She was so attentive, very nice and house was clean and had everything we needed.

We loved our stay at the Quaint Cottage in Borger, TX! We came for the HS Graduation and everything was so wonderful. Great location central to everything we needed. Communication was excellent and Check-in/out was super easy. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks!

This house is spacious, with great natural light, and has all the room a family needs to feel at home. Several cars will fit in the driveway so you don‚Äôt have to park in the street. The WiFi works very well on the two tvs. The open kitchen is well-equipped for cooking. Having two bathrooms is very convenient. The washer and dryer in the sunny laundry room work great. The fenced backyard is perfect for kids or pets. The polite host is local, responds promptly and makes you feel at home. Lake Meredith is less than 20 minutes west of here and the water is GORGEOUS! Make the drive if you‚Äôre here! You‚Äôll be glad you did!

This house is very spacious, extremely clean and has central heat and air. It‚Äôs very comfortable, with good beds and everything you need for a long stay. The sunny laundry room has an efficient washer and dryer. The fenced backyard is great for kids. Amarillo is less than an hour to the South. Lake Meredith is about 20 minutes West, so it‚Äôs a great location in the Texas panhandle. The hosts are friendly and respond promptly to any questions. We highly recommend staying here.
This a great house. We have stayed before and will definitely stay again!
The home was clean and check in/out was easy
Best one in Borger. if it's available get it, before my crew does.

Thoughtful, extremely clean and comfortable. Our stay could not have been more convenient and enjoyable. Any amenity we needed was available, it felt like walking in to our own home. Definitely the go to place if you're visiting Borger or any surrounding area. We will be back!
The house was very clean and cozy. And deceptively large! Thanks Sam for being a great host!

The house was prefect for us. It had everything we needed and bigger than we expected. 3 bedrooms and 2 baths accommodated all of us perfectly! We went to the lake everyday, which is only 20 minutes away, so having a washer and dryer was amazing! Definitely will be coming back!

This place is super cute! Great for families! There are two bathrooms, plenty of places to sleep, and it's really close to the lake.
We had two small children and the weather didn't cooperate for swimming, but there was still no shortage of fun stuff to get up to. The hosts were responsive to all our needs (we didn't have many) and the whole house was spotless. The beds are comfortable and even I got a good night's sleep which says A LOT. I've already convinced some different friends to go back with me!
The house is wonderful. It is cleansed roomy. Perfect for a family!
Best BnB in Borger. If it's available get it quick.
This is a great place! Centrally located. Stay here! You won't regret it!
The house was spotless and had everything necessary to make a enjoyable stay. Would recommend over any of the local hotels.
This is the cutest house. It smells good and was super clean. Very comfy and has everything you need.

Sam‚Äôs place was perfect for my family. When the whole family comes to visit we usually get hotel rooms as we cannot all fit in my parents home. The place looks totally renovated on the inside. It‚Äôs bigger, better and cheaper than getting hotel rooms.

The neighborhood is hit or miss, weeds for ground cover, no landscaping. Indoors Plenty of room to spread out and have guest over. Lighting minimal.Bring your own shampoo, conditioner and body wash. Spoke to Sam about a few items needing attention for the next guest t be comfortable. Washer and dryer always a perk. No outside seating.
Amazing house!
Amazing house! Excellent location and amazing hosts! Highly recommend!
This house is nicely updated, very clean and inviting. Will definitely use again!
Wonderful accommodations for families. Super clean and lots of personal touches. Very convient to shopping, restaurants and Lake Meredith. Check in was super easy and Sam was a great host. Thank You.
Great house. Plenty of room, and very clean.
Cool place. Very clean and well kept interior. Quiet neighbor hood, close to town and not far from the lake. Great experience.

This place is definitely worth staying at whether you are in town for business or leisure. It was nice to feel comfortable and at home while I was working in Borger for 3 weeks.
Sam is an incredible host that makes sure his guests have everything they need.
Very clean and spacious place.
Super clean, family friendly place to stay. We‚Äôve stayed here twice now and it‚Äôs been great each time!
Real nice place to stay close to everything
Fantastic place and exceptional value. Would book here again.
Will definitely return for future needs! Everything was great!
Very nice house, Sam was very helpful with any questions I had. I would stay here again in the future. Very convenient location.

Our stay with Sam was excellent. The location was perfect for us and what we needed. Everything was clean and worked perfectly. Sam answered all our questions and was easy to contact. I would recommend Sam's place to anyone.
Sam was so helpful! The house was sparkling clean. Definitely recommend
